"A toothbrush that uses AI technology to provide personalized brushing instructions based on your specific oral health needs and habits."
"A toothbrush that has built-in sensors to monitor your brushing technique and provide feedback to help you improve your oral hygiene."
"A toothbrush that has a self-sanitizing mechanism to kill germs and bacteria on the bristles after each use."
"A toothbrush that uses eco-friendly materials and is designed to be fully recyclable, reducing waste in landfills."
"A toothbrush that has a built-in timer and pressure sensor to ensure that you brush for the recommended two minutes and apply the right amount of pressure to your teeth."
